trait.name: Lucky Footwork
entries: Ches can add 2 ({@damage 1d4}) when making a Dexterity saving throw.

trait.name: Hare Trigger
entries: Ches gains a {@b +3} bonus to initiative.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Ches can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Arcane Shot (2/Short Rest)
entries: Ches can apply an Arcane Shot Option to an arrow when they make a ranged weapon attack

items.name: {@b Piercing Arrow}
items.entry: The shot goes passes through a 30 foot long line and creatures in it must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage or half as much on a successful save.

items.name: {@b Blinding Shot}
items.entry: The shot does an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to see anything farther than 5 feet away until the start of Ches's next turn.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Rabbit Hop (3/Long Rest)
entries: Ches can jump 15 ft. without provoking opportunity attacks.
